sentences.english: Stable two-way shape memory effect can be gained by thermo-mechanical cycling.
sentences.chinese: 通過訓練可以獲得穩定的雙程記憶效應。

sentences.english: I want to purchase a round trip ticket to Chengdu.
sentences.chinese: 我想買張去成都的雙程票。

sentences.english: The employee will be entitled to only one round trip ticket to serve for both the business trip and the vacation.
sentences.chinese: 員工的商務出差和度假只能享有一張雙程票。

sentences.english: In this paper, we report the experimental results of a two-pass amplification atomic iodine laser amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了雙程放大碘原子激光放大器的實驗結果。

sentences.english: Two-way memory effect and the abnormal deformation phenomenon were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了合金的雙程記憶效應與異常形變現象。

sentences.english: They're not going with round-trip tickets.
Round-trip tickets from Frankfurtto Singapore sank to less than $700.
sentences.chinese: 從法蘭克福到新加破的雙程機票跌到不到700美金。

sentences.english: A structure of off-axes double passes amplifier is used.
sentences.chinese: 激光放大系統採用離軸雙程放大結構。

sentences.english: This is where the double haul form of casting becomes essential.
sentences.chinese: 這是雙程鑄造成了必不可少的形式。

definition: to engage in fraudulent activities (idiom)/skulduggery/to hoodwink people/to cheat sb audaciously
to make a detour/to take the long route
to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
to assign sb to a seat/to be allocated a place
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
you can't guard against it (idiom)/impossible to defend effectively/not much one can do about it/It can't be prevented.
domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
to discard in the wrong place (cigarette butts etc)/to leave one's things lying around
